name: Friary Road (Fermi Paradox Game Jam Version)
name_original: Friary Road (Fermi Paradox Game Jam Version)
description:
This is the Jam Version of Friary Road. For the full experience play the reimagined version here.

A magical realist point and click short. Bo and Ao are the last ones left after a barbecue and find themselves stargazing.

Made in a day for the Fermi Jam

Soundtrack by Paws Menu
[download here]
bandcamp
tumblr
twitter

Press:

Rock Paper Shotgun – "Parched dialogue, play-like scenery, between-the-lines player responses."

Kill Screen – "Emphatically down to earth, it's a short vignette of the most human of moments."

Pip Turner: Itching For More – "Friary Road perfectly captures that feeling in the pit of your stomach when you look up and see the millions of stars above you, and you shrink yourself down from being the centre of the universe."
